requirement_text: Configure VIA authentication provider for mergecombinator.com
target_value: VIA OAuth flow works for MC domain
notes: OAuth provider 'defense-builders' configured with client_id mc-web-prod. 5 redirect URIs. Cloudflare Worker at /auth/* implements PKCE flow. Manual testing remaining.

requirement_text: Add client-side auth service for VIA integration
target_value: Auth state managed in browser
notes: Implemented at js/builders/auth.js. Cloudflare Worker at cloudflare/auth.js handles PKCE. APIs: isAuthenticated() getUser() redirectToLogin() getLogoutUrl().

requirement_text: Add account management and logout to site UI
target_value: User can see account info and sign out from header
notes: Implemented in js/auth-nav.js: user avatar with initial, display name, dropdown with Operations Console and Terminate Session. Done as part of REQ-CONTENT-002.

requirement_text: VIA passkey flow allows attempt on unconfigured domains then shows poor error UX
target_value: Passkey option hidden or error page provides clear recovery path
notes: PARTIAL: Custom flow template injects error detection script. Passkey cancel/WebAuthn errors show recovery popup. Identification errors (unknown email) don't trigger popup - shadow DOM blocks text detection. Template at /via/authentik/custom-templates/if/flow.html.

requirement_text: Investigate existing passkey-hide policy for reuse
target_value: Find and evaluate existing stage/policy that hides passkey option
notes: Research complete. Found WebAuthnDevice pattern in via-oauth-flow.yaml. Recommendation: SKIP implementation - BUG-001 recovery page approach is better UX.

requirement_text: Builder modals shall show restricted fields only to authenticated users
target_value: Private fields (videoUrl pitchUrl) require auth
notes: Enhanced auth gating in js/builders/components.js. Resources section shows placeholder for unauthenticated users. C2UX compliant language. CTA box shows different actions based on auth state.

requirement_text: Add auth UI components to site header
target_value: Login/logout buttons visible and functional
notes: Auth UI in header across 11 pages. js/auth-nav.js dynamically shows Authenticate button or user dropdown. C2UX language: Authenticate Operations Console Terminate Session.

requirement_text: docs.mergecombinator.com shall use VIA SSO
target_value: Users authenticate once for both sites
notes: Outline Wiki with VIA OIDC. Cross-subdomain sessions via COOKIE_DOMAIN=.mergecombinator.com in wrangler.toml. createCookieHeader updated for domain support.

requirement_text: Unified navigation between mc-site and docs
target_value: Consistent header/nav across properties
notes: Added Docs link to main navigation across 17 HTML pages. Link goes to https://docs.mergecombinator.com. Also added to footer Resources section.

requirement_text: Contributor access workflow for docs editors
target_value: Approved users can edit knowledge base
notes: VIA group for docs-contributors. Approval workflow similar to SigmaBlox access requests. Outline Wiki permission sync.

requirement_text: Evolve site toward command center UX patterns
target_value: Operational interface replacing marketing site
notes: index.html transformed to console layout with status rail. CSS design tokens updated for C2UX (dark theme, Inter-only, sharp edges). Navigation updated across 17 pages. Marketing language removed, testimonials removed.

requirement_text: Add ecosystem status dashboard view
target_value: Real-time ecosystem activity visible
notes: Dashboard at /dashboard with builder inventory, mission coverage, recent records. Status link added to nav across 16 pages. Auto-refresh 60s. C2UX compliant panels. Docs activity deferred - requires Outline API integration.

requirement_text: Create Merge Combinator privacy policy
target_value: Compliant privacy policy at /privacy.html
notes: Comprehensive privacy policy covering VIA auth data, user profiles, analytics, cookies, Defense Builders data. GDPR/CCPA compliant.

requirement_text: Create SigmaBlox privacy policy
target_value: Compliant privacy policy at sigmablox.com/privacy
notes: Ghost template custom-privacy.hbs created. Deploy theme and create Ghost page at /privacy to activate.

requirement_text: Prompt passkey setup after fallback login methods
target_value: After Google/magic-link login, user sees 'Say goodbye to passwords. Setup Passkey.' prompt
notes: Adobe-inspired UX: when user logs in via fallback method (Google, magic link) because they couldn't use passkey/password, prompt them to set up a passkey. Reduces future friction. Requires: post-login redirect stage, passkey enrollment flow, skip/remind-later option. BLOCKED: VIA lift-and-shift in progress.

requirement_text: Create api.mergecombinator.com for VIA webhook services
target_value: VIA flows use api.mergecombinator.com instead of api.sigmablox.com
notes: DNS: api.mergecombinator.com doesn't exist yet. Needs: 1) DNS record, 2) Cloudflare Worker or Cloud Run service, 3) Update VIA flow templates api_base default, 4) Update via/config. Templates already config-driven via {{ api_base }}. SigmaBlox-specific content stays on api.sigmablox.com.

requirement_text: Build Fourthwall import package (CSV + assets)
target_value: CSV imports with zero errors and drafts created
notes: Shopify-compatible CSV created at docs/merch/fourthwall-import.csv. Fourthwall lacks native import; CSV serves as structured data for manual entry.

requirement_text: Create print placement sheets + mockups
target_value: Placement sheets approved for each merch category
notes: 7 placement sheets created in docs/merch/placement-sheets/. Covers all categories with dimensions, colors, print methods.

requirement_text: Finalize product copy + tags (operational tone)
target_value: All listings have approved titles
notes: MEDIUM
dependencies: Product copy guide at docs/merch/product-copy.md. Catalog updated with standardized 5-tag taxonomy.

requirement_text: Missing /combine page - broken nav link across 16 pages
target_value: /combine resolves to dedicated page or nav links updated
notes: Created combine.html with C2UX-compliant design. 5-day timeline, participant requirements, cohort history, next session info. Added to vite.config.js build inputs.

requirement_text: Partner logos referenced wrong path in index.html
target_value: All partner logo images load correctly
notes: index.html lines 873-879 referenced assets/logos/*.svg but files were in assets/logos/partners/*.svg. Fixed path references.

requirement_text: Inconsistent script type=module loading across pages
target_value: All pages use consistent script loading pattern
notes: dashboard.html combine.html loaded script.js without type=module. builders.html had type=module on auth-nav.js (not needed). Standardized pattern.

requirement_text: Portfolio case study links non-functional (href=#)
target_value: All placeholder links show pending state clearly
notes: 7 case study links pointed to href=#. Replaced with disabled spans and PENDING badge following C2UX explicit state doctrine.

requirement_text: Mobile UI/UX review and optimization for mergecombinator.com
target_value: All pages responsive and usable on mobile devices
notes: Mobile audit complete. All pages pass: no horizontal scroll hamburger menu works modals scroll forms full-width. CSS has 64 media queries across 3 files.

requirement_text: VIA local dev integration and error popup testing
target_value: Login flow works on localhost with error recovery banner
notes: PARTIAL: Custom flow template at /via/authentik/custom-templates/if/flow.html. Popup works for passkey/WebAuthn errors. Does NOT work for identification errors (unknown email shows 'Failed to authenticate' but popup doesn't appear). Shadow DOM blocking text detection. See sitrep-2026-02-04-via-auth-popup.md

requirement_text: Complete MC Router restructuring per docs/refactor/restructure.md
target_value: Turnstile works, config hardened, tests complete, subdomains ready
notes: All acceptance criteria met. Turnstile verified. OAuth config validation. 47+ test assertions with CI. control.mergecombinator.com live on Cloud Run (control-layer service, sigmablox project). app/wingman DNS created with placeholder CF Pages deployed — pending CF Pages custom domain binding in dashboard. Deployment docs complete.

requirement_text: /opportunities returns 500 from SBIR origin
target_value: sbir.mergecombinator.com responds correctly when proxied via mc-router
notes: RESOLVED: Replaced SBIR proxy with dedicated Opportunities platform. CF Pages frontend at mc-opportunities.pages.dev. CF Worker API at opportunities-api.defensebuilders.workers.dev proxies DoD SBIR search API with correct topicReleaseStatus filtering. mc-router updated to proxy /opportunities to CF Pages.

requirement_text: Unify dark theme across all pages
target_value: Single dark-native CSS architecture
notes: Dark theme rules already merged in styles.css (lines 4695-5588). Deleted dark-theme.css and builders-dark.css. builders.css already dark-native. Removed import from programs/the-combine.html.

requirement_text: Add missing footers to all pages
target_value: All public pages have consistent footer
notes: Full footer added to access.html, guild.html. Upgraded simple footers in wingman.html, briefs.html. Dashboard intentionally omitted (C2UX).

requirement_text: Mobile navigation polish
target_value: Smooth animations and proper dropdown handling
notes: Close menu on link click, outside tap, Escape key. Body scroll lock. Touch targets 44px minimum. Hamburger animation.

requirement_text: Hero section enhancement
target_value: Greater visual impact on large screens
notes: SVG diagram scales to 520px/600px at 1400px+/1800px+. Canvas opacity 0.6→0.75. Node density +33% on large screens. Particle spawn 2x. Parallax enhanced with rAF and canvas fade. Counters and stagger already functional.

requirement_text: Consolidate page-specific CSS
target_value: Maintainable CSS architecture
notes: Extracted inline styles from all 19 pages into styles/*.css. 16 new CSS files. ~860 net lines of inline code removed.

requirement_text: Loading states and page transitions
target_value: Skeleton screens and smooth transitions
notes: View Transitions API (MPA cross-document). Skeleton loaders on builders grid and dashboard metrics/activity/coverage. Link prefetch on hover. Expanded prefers-reduced-motion.

requirement_text: Review docs and archive completed tasks
target_value: All docs reflect current state and completed tasks archived
notes: Review sitreps, requirement files, RTMX database. Archive completed items with dates. Remove stale references.

requirement_text: Unified modular navbar component (single source of truth)
target_value: One shared navbar component used across all pages (main site, opportunities, docs) with consistent branding and links
notes: Navbar is currently duplicated: static HTML across 19+ pages in main site, separate React component in opportunities/src/components/Layout.tsx, and Outline Wiki header in docs. Changes require updating every copy. Goal: extract a single modular component (web component or shared partial) that all properties consume. Should handle: responsive mobile menu, Platform dropdown, auth state (Sign in/Join vs user avatar), active page highlighting, and environment-aware links.
